description: This view provides easy querying of before and after values for items changed on patient genomic indicators.

columns.name: PAT_INDICATOR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the patient genomic indicator record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: AUDIT_TRAIL_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant of edit for changes to this patient indicator.

columns.name: AUDIT_TRAIL_DTTM
columns.description: Instant of edit for changes to this patient indicator in local time of the server.

columns.name: AUDIT_TRAIL_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who made the edit tracked to the patient genomic indicator

columns.name: CHANGED_DATA_ELEMENT
columns.description: The EHI data element that was changed

columns.name: PREV_CHANGED_ITEM_GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The group line of the previous value of the changed element this entry represents. For changed elements that allow only a single response, this will always be 1.

columns.name: PREV_CHANGED_ITEM_VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: PREV_STRING_VALUE
columns.description: If the changed element stores a string value, this column holds the previous string value.

columns.name: PREV_NUMBER_VALUE
columns.description: If the changed element stores a numeric value, this column holds the previous numeric value.

columns.name: PREV_UTC_DTTM_VALUE
columns.description: If the changed element stores a UTC date and time, this column stores the previous value.

columns.name: PREV_LOC_DTTM_VALUE
columns.description: If the changed element stores a date or a date and time, this column stores the previous value in system local time.

columns.name: PREV_GEN_INDICATOR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the previous genomic indicator record for this row.

columns.name: PREV_GEN_INDICATOR_ID_RESOLVED_PAT_FRIENDLY_NAME
columns.description: This column provides an always populated name column that prioritizes the patient friendly name and if there is none specified, falls back to the clinical name.

columns.name: PREV_PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the previous patient record for this row.

columns.name: PREV_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the previous note record for this row.

columns.name: PREV_CREATION_SOURCE_C
columns.description: The creation source category ID for the previous creation source associated with this row

columns.name: PREV_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the previous order record for this row.

columns.name: PREV_COMPONENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the previous component record for this row.

columns.name: PREV_COMPONENT_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component.

columns.name: PREV_VARIANT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the previous discrete variant record for this row.

columns.name: PREV_DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the previous document record for this row.

columns.name: PREV_PAT_GENOMICS_IND_SRC_C
columns.description: The linking source category ID for the previous creation source associated with this row

columns.name: NEW_CHANGED_ITEM_GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The group line of the new value of the changed element this entry represents. For changed elements that allow only a single response, this will always be 1.

columns.name: NEW_CHANGED_ITEM_VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The value line of the new value of the changed element this entry represents. For changed elements that allow only a single response or one set of grouping, this will always be 1.

columns.name: NEW_STRING_VALUE
columns.description: If the changed element stores a string value, this column holds the new string value.

columns.name: NEW_NUMBER_VALUE
columns.description: If the changed element stores a numeric value, this column holds the new numeric value.

columns.name: NEW_UTC_DTTM_VALUE
columns.description: If the changed element stores a UTC date and time, this column stores the updated value.

columns.name: NEW_LOC_DTTM_VALUE
columns.description: If the changed element stores a date or a date and time, this column stores the updated value in system local time.

columns.name: NEW_GEN_INDICATOR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the new genomic indicator record for this row.

columns.name: NEW_GEN_INDICATOR_ID_RESOLVED_PAT_FRIENDLY_NAME
columns.description: This column provides an always populated name column that prioritizes the patient friendly name and if there is none specified, falls back to the clinical name.

columns.name: NEW_PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the new patient record for this row.

columns.name: NEW_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the new note record for this row.

columns.name: NEW_CREATION_SOURCE_C
columns.description: The creation source category ID for the new creation source associated with this row

columns.name: NEW_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the new order record for this row.

columns.name: NEW_COMPONENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the new component record for this row.

columns.name: NEW_COMPONENT_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component.

columns.name: NEW_VARIANT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the new discrete variant record for this row.

columns.name: NEW_DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the new document record for this row.

columns.name: NEW_PAT_GENOMICS_IND_SRC_C
columns.description: The linking source category ID for the new creation source associated with this row
